description: I think many of us are already familiar with the taste of gingerbread coffee as it has become a classic variation to traditional coffee. However, did you know that you can take it even one step further by adding your favorite alcoholic beverage and making Spiked Gingerbread Coffee?This unique twist to gingerbread coffee will surely satisfy both coffee lovers and alcohol lovers at the same time!
name: Spiked Gingerbread Coffee
